The median temperature at the time of a COVID-19 death was 9.72¬∞C (10-90th percentile 5.39-14.11¬∞C) whilst the median temperature of the world population was 7.55¬∞C warmer at 17.27¬∞C (10-90th percentile 2.57¬∞C-27.76¬∞C) with a notional p-value = 1.1x10-10. 80% of all COVID-19 related cases and deaths occurred between 4.29¬∞C and 17.97¬∞C.
